meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Pope John Paul II is to consecrate the largest Christian church in the world, scorned by many as extravagant, in the Ivory Coast. Page A3.
Drivers and highway engineers are developing an array of alarms and diversions to avoid a growing menace to traffic: deer.

Dr. Bernadine P. Healy of Cleveland was selected to head the National Institutes of Health. Page A18.
Northeastern unity on acid rain has been disrupted by plans for a coal-burning plant in New York. Page B1.
